message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, so I'm proposing a smaller difference. Let's close the deal before inflation hurts us both.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
This is a very generous offer considering the inflation. Let's be reasonable and end this here.
Considering inflation, this is a fair compromise
Alice, inflation is working against you more than me.  Take this opportunity to secure a decent amount, or risk getting even less.
